title: Remove Background Task Expiry Limit
body: The idea of background agents expiring if they have not been 're-initialized' in two weeks makes sense.  However, in some scenarios they do not make sense.

comments.body: I use continuum to my cintiq for portable schoolwork. It would be nice to have the pressure and shortcut support the cintiq offers with its drivers on PC.

Give devs access to real time background agents, remove these sh!t box restrictions, even iOS and Android can fire local notification from a background agent once a task is complete in realtime.....30 minute "not so live" tiles.....what a WOFTAM.....users life life in real time, no one want to wait 30 minutes for anything.....again, iOS has real time red circles on icons, pretty sure android has real time as well!
have a background agent enable all the time to execute an application event not execute them periodically
